mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (username, remail, fpemail, phone, productname, producturl, joindate, createtime) VALUES(#{username},#{remail},#{fpemail},#{phone},#{productname},#{producturl},#{joindate},#{createtime})
mapper.select:
SELECT seqid, username, remail, fpemail, phone, productname, producturl, joindate, createtime FROM account
AND username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
AND remail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{remail},'%')
AND fpemail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{fpemail},'%')
AND productname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{productname},'%')
AND producturl LIKE CONCAT('%',#{producturl},'%')
LIMIT 0,1
